sentences.sContent: After several delays we finally took off at six o’clock.
sentences.sCn: 几经耽搁后，我们终于在六点起飞了。

sentences.sContent: Finally, Karpov cracked under the pressure.
sentences.sCn: 最后，卡尔波夫承受不住压力崩溃了。

sentences.sContent: ...A couple of recent papers have finally opened a window on these people’s extraordinary minds...
...and finally pours into the Bohai Sea...
...and finally reach some agreements and principals...
...All the colored men at the paper mill worked on "the platform"—loading paper into trucks until the craft unions were finally integrated in 1968...
...I finally gained the confidence and passed the exam...
...I wanted to start a program that would make 2012 the year I finally got in shape...
...The difficult situation finally changed when Aaron moved recently...
...finally cleared up the confusion about why people sometimes perform better and sometimes worse in front of an audience...

words.tran: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行
